amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 118-280 to correct the number of hostages being held by Hamas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gottheimer amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gottheimer amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gottheimer amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
